name: ProjectPony
description:
Project Pony is short and silly game.

In only 60 seconds you will need to first hit as many zombies as you can and then after they catch you try to score by turning ponies into zombies :)

Instructions:
  • Mouse on menu screens,
  • keyboard arrows for running and jumping
  • space button for fire on level 1.

Github: https://github.com/cosmicmumbear/ProjectPony
